Todo list

A simple to-do list maker to manage personal tasks so you never forget what you need to do next.

This to-do list application works well within your favourite browser, saving your list locally in Local Storage . That means you will not be able to see your list on another device or even in another browser on the same device.

You can find a visual guide to the user interface and key features of the application by clicking on the APP DEMO button.
